revised_title: On Trigonometric Series with Cesàro Partial Summations Oscillating Finitely
tldr: The author investigates trigonometric series and their Cesàro partial summations, proving that if the upper and lower functions of these summations are summable and finite, the trigonometric series converges to an integral. This result extends previous findings and provides a more comprehensive understanding of Cesàro summation in the theory of Fourier series.
